name: 2 count(1)
content: select M1.CATEGORY_NAME AS COLUMN1, M2.CATEGORY_NAME AS COLUMN2,			M.COURSE_NAME AS COLUMN3,			Concat(Concat(M.AGE_FROM,"个月"),"-",Concat(M.AGE_TO,"个月")) AS COLUMN4,			M.COURSE_TIMES AS COLUMN5,			Concat(M.ORIGINAL_PRICE,"元") AS COLUMN6,			"详情" AS COLUMN7			,M.COURSE_ID AS COLUMN8			FROM M_COURSE AS M			LEFT JOIN M_CATEGORY AS M1 ON M1.CATEGORY_ID = M.CATEGORY1_ID AND			M1.DELETE_FLAG = 0			LEFT JOIN M_CATEGORY AS M2 ON M2.CATEGORY_ID = M.CATEGORY2_ID AND			M2.CATEGORY_LEVEL = 2 AND M2.DELETE_FLAG = 0			WHERE M.DELETE_FLAG = 0
